official_title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam to provide for removal by recall of certain elected officials, and to authorize initiatives and referenda.

summary.text: Amends the Organic Act of Guam to authorize initiatives and referenda in Guam. Sets forth the referendum procedure. Subjects the following Guam public officials to recall: (1) the Lieutenant Governor; (2) the members of the Legislature; and (3) the Guam delegate to the U.S. House of Representatives.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Organic Act of Guam to provide for removal by recall of certain elected officials, and to authorize initiatives and referenda.
